price: Ila mkewe. Tunakadiria huyo atakuwa miongoni watao bakia nyuma.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَآ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: Na hatoangamia katika ahli zake ila mkewe, kwani yeye hakumfuata mumewe, bali yu pamoja na hao wakosefu ambao wanao stahiki adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnā innahā lamina al-ghābirīna
